content.query:
use oxemarine_ldw
GO

if object_id('silver.devicedetail') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.devicedetail
GO
-- cant delete file here in sql
-- use synapse pipeline then execute this script

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.devicedetail
WITH (
    DATA_SOURCE = oxemarine_src,
    LOCATION = 'silver/devicedetail',
    FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
)
AS 
SELECT *
    FROM bronze.device_name
;

select * from silver.devicedetail
order by 1
